item.title: CPU analysis and Software design summary
item.description: Click PDF and see details. Point out an error For the question that “Why is Thread instead of Process in ‘4 Core 8 Thread’ ?” in PDF Firstly，a point should be clearly，which is that Thread in ‘4 Core 8 Thread’ is different with Thread in operating system.The former
